foods.title: Margherita Pizza
foods.description: Classic Italian pizza topped with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil.

foods.title: Sushi Platter
foods.description: An assortment of fresh sushi rolls including tuna, salmon, and avocado.

foods.title: Cheeseburger
foods.description: Juicy beef patty with melted cheese, lettuce, tomato, and pickles on a toasted bun.

foods.title: Penne Alfredo
foods.description: Creamy Alfredo sauce over perfectly cooked penne pasta, garnished with parsley.

foods.title: Tacos al Pastor
foods.description: Mexican-style tacos with marinated pork, pineapple, and fresh cilantro.

foods.title: Chicken Caesar Salad
foods.description: Grilled chicken over romaine lettuce with Caesar dressing, croutons, and Parmesan.

foods.title: Pad Thai
foods.description: Stir-fried rice noodles with shrimp, tofu, peanuts, and tangy tamarind sauce.

foods.title: Butter Chicken
foods.description: Indian dish with tender chicken in a creamy tomato-based sauce, served with naan.

foods.title: Vegan Buddha Bowl
foods.description: Colorful mix of quinoa, chickpeas, roasted vegetables, and tahini dressing.

foods.title: Pho
foods.description: Vietnamese noodle soup with beef, rice noodles, herbs, and flavorful broth.

foods.title: French Croissant
foods.description: Buttery, flaky pastry perfect for breakfast or a light snack.

foods.title: Chocolate Lava Cake
foods.description: Rich chocolate cake with a molten center, served warm with vanilla ice cream.
